mapper.select: select * from cloud_sign where user_id = #{user_id} and sign_status=#{sign_status}

select cloud_user.user_name,cloud_sign.sign_status from cloud_user LEFT JOIN (select * from cloud_sign where sign_date between #{firstTime} and #{lastTime}) as cloud_sign on cloud_user.user_id=cloud_sign.user_id where cloud_user.user_status=1 order by cloud_user.user_stu_id,cloud_sign.sign_status
